text: Abu-Shakur Balkhi (; born 915 in Balkh), or Boshakor Balkhi, was a Persian poet. He lived in the Samanid era in central Asian Persia and wrote the Afarin Nama in 944. He died in Balkh, now in modern Afghanistan. Category:Persian poets Category:915 births Category:Year of death unknown
title: Abu-Shakur Balkhi
